front.title: IEEE Standards for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks: Supplement to Media Access Control (MAC) Bridges - IEEE Standard 802.6 Distributed Queue Dual Bus (DQDB) Subnetwork of a MAN

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Modifications and additions to IEEE Std 802.1D-1990 that extend its scope and field of application to transparent bridging between 802.6 Subnetworks of MANs and between Fibre Distributed Data Interface (FDDI), IEEE 802 LANs and 802.6 Subnetworks of MANs are specified.
